comments:
My workspace is in a state where I can't run any jobs anymore. The progress view
is stuck showing "building workspace 100%". One could assume that the build was
the last Job to run then. The progress view is not updating, probably because
Jobs can't be run. This may be related to the JDT test case NPE in enqueue?
